actions.text: On agreeing to the Kirk amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment included vessels that operate exclusively in the Great Lakes ecosystem among vessels that would be required to have a ballast water treatment system, at the request of the Secretary of Agriculture.
purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part B of House Report 110-604 to include vessels that operate exclusively in the Great Lakes ecosystem among vessels that would be required to have a ballast water treatment system, at the request of the Secretary of Agriculture.
